ourEthos.title: Our Ethos
ourEthos.subtitle: Personalised. Empowering. World-Class.
ourEthos.description: At My Private Tutor Online, we believe that every child deserves an education tailored to who they are — not just where they're expected to go.

mainContent.introduction: Our Founder Elizabeth didn't walk a conventional education path and we don't expect our tutees to either. Instead, we meet each student where they are and help them build the confidence, curiosity and clarity to move forward with purpose.
mainContent.philosophy: We combine academic rigour with personal mentorship, recognising that long-term success depends as much on emotional resilience and self-belief as it does on subject mastery.

sections.title: Global Perspective, Local Sensitivity
content: With a team of world-class educators and experience spanning seven continents, we bring a truly global lens to tutoring. Families today are internationally mobile and often navigating multiple education systems. Our bespoke approach adapts to those complexities, offering structure, insight and flexibility.
Whether your child is preparing for the British school system, moving abroad, or sitting highly competitive exams, we help bridge the gap with confidence and clarity.

sections.title: Supportive Guidance, Independent Growth
content: Great tutoring begins with trust. That's why we take the time to understand your child — not just academically, but personally. We want to know what makes them tick so we can build a relationship where they feel seen, motivated, and empowered.

Our goal isn't long-term dependence — it's lasting confidence. We aim to become a victim of our own success: equipping students with the tools, strategies, and mindset to become independent learners. Tutoring should never be a crutch. We act as a guide and advocate during challenging moments, always with the aim of leading students back toward self-sufficiency.

statistics.description: Consistent offers from Oxford and Cambridge

ourEthos.conclusion: Let us help your child find their path — and the courage to walk it with confidence.

story.title: Our Story
story.content:
Founded in 2012 by experienced educators who recognised the need for high-quality, accessible online tutoring, our platform has evolved into a comprehensive educational solution. What began as a small team of passionate teachers has grown into a thriving community of expert tutors, innovative technology, and successful students.

Our journey has been driven by a simple belief: every student deserves access to excellent education, regardless of their location or circumstances. This philosophy has guided our growth and continues to shape our approach to online learning.

approach.title: Our Teaching Approach
approach.description: We believe in a student-centred approach that combines proven pedagogical methods with modern technology to create engaging, effective learning experiences.

methodology.title: Initial Assessment
methodology.description: Comprehensive evaluation of student's current knowledge, learning style, and goals to create a personalised learning plan.

methodology.title: Tailored Learning Plan
methodology.description: Custom curriculum designed specifically for each student's needs, incorporating their preferred learning methods and pace.

methodology.title: Interactive Sessions
methodology.description: Engaging one-to-one sessions using our advanced platform with interactive tools, real-time collaboration, and multimedia resources.

methodology.title: Continuous Monitoring
methodology.description: Regular progress tracking and assessment to ensure optimal learning outcomes and adjust strategies as needed.

methodology.title: Ongoing Support
methodology.description: 24/7 academic support, revision materials, and exam preparation to ensure long-term success and confidence.
